help.title: Help
help.description: Helpful explanations of the course interface

player.title: Course Audio Player
player.description: Controls audio associated with the page. When audio is not present an empty bar is shown.

back.title: Back Button
back.description: Select this to navigate to the previous page

page.title: Current Page
page.description: Show current and total pages in lesson

next.title: Next Button
next.description: Select this to navigate to the next page

instructions.title: How to use help
instructions.description: Select a numbered circle to reveal the function of the associated interface element. When you're done select the 'Close Help' button to exit the help section.
